name: Sritangtini
description: A refreshing citrus drink with a subtle spice kick.
directions: Moisten the rim of the martini glass with chili oil, the dip in salt and chili powder.
Put Citron vodka, Cointreau, Ginger, Gallingale, Lemongrass, Kaffir lime leaf, lime juice, and simple syrup in a shaker.
Add ice and shake well. Pour into martini glass.
Garnish with lemongrass stick, kaffir lime leaf, and lemon slice.
